title: With whom can I use Collaborate?

sections.title: Symptoms
content: • I am interested in using Unity Collaborate and would like to know if there are any restrictions, such as the maximum number of people with whom I can use it.

sections.title: Cause
content: You would like to know of any restrictions or if there exists a limit to how many people with whom you may use Unity Collaborate.

sections.title: Resolution
content: You can use Unity Collaborate with anyone, but no more than 5 Unity Personal users per project.
